body_html:
I do a quick test about your code with the script. the result show there is not as good as unsorted_segment_sum with larger scale of segment_ids.

unsorted_segment_sum: 5.616264s
sorted_segment_sum: 7.558630s
unique ids: 6287

body:
I do a quick test about your code with the [script](https://gist.github.com/nolanliou/a1dc1df3d7d6267a0177b6749ccdf696). the result show there is not as good as unsorted_segment_sum with larger scale of segment_ids.
```
unsorted_segment_sum: 5.616264s
sorted_segment_sum: 7.558630s
unique ids: 6287
```
